name: The quantum prisoner - teaser
description:
Play the interactive teaser of the upcoming Quantum Prisoner adventure game! (available during summer 2020)

More information on the official website:  https://quantum-prisoner.com

In this game, you'll travel around the world with Zoe to find Artus Cropp's legacy, and live a great adventure at the heart of science and technology! Discover the secret through a  true story of SF. Around 12 hours of playing time, and 30 puzzles to progress in the plot, involving scientific or technologic devices or phenomemons that you'll  discover or review by playing this game, such as a particle accelerator, the climate change, programming a robot, creating an energy mix... and much more!

This game is TOTALLY FREE, without registration, without advertising, and can be played directly in your browser (no plugin). 

The Quantum Prisoner is a game made by the CEA, a French public sciencific research organization. Its only purpose is to make science fun and more accessible!

Keep in touch on our Discord server to be informed when the game is online and share the teaser on social networks with the hashtag #QuantumPrisonerGame
